articles.title: Supermassive Black Hole's Spin Verified – Einstein's General Theory of Relativity Shines - SciTechDaily
articles.description: The M87 galaxy's black hole exhibits an oscillating jet, confirming its spin, as deduced from a two-decade study aligning with Einstein's General Theory of Relativity predictions. The nearby radio galaxy M87, located 55 million light-years from the Earth and …
